io.janusproject.services.network

Class NetworkConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.services.network.NetworkConfig

  • public final class NetworkConfig
extends Object
    Public configuration properties for the network modules. Define the properties as required in your application module as a Named annotation.
    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

      Fields

      static String AES_KEY
      Name of the property for the AES key.
      static String BYTE_ARRAY_STRING_CHARSET_NAME
      Name of the property for charset that must be used for string encoding.
      static Charset BYTE_ARRAY_STRING_CHARSET_VALUE
      Charset that should be used for converting String to byte array or byte array to String.
      static String ENCRYPTER_CLASSNAME
      Name of the property for the classname of the encrypter to use.
      static String SERIALIZER_CLASSNAME
      Name of the property for the classname of the serializer to use.

      • BYTE_ARRAY_STRING_CHARSET_VALUE

        public static final Charset BYTE_ARRAY_STRING_CHARSET_VALUE
        Charset that should be used for converting String to byte array or byte array to String.

        This constant was introduced to enforce the values on different platforms.

        See Also:
        BYTE_ARRAY_STRING_CHARSET_NAME
